ygData.subject: RE: Langseax quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can also buy the wristbands from various vendors around halas John ... From:	Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@cerner.com] Sent:	Tuesday, August 17, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
You can also buy the wristbands from various vendors around halas
John

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 3:53 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Langseax quest?

From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>

Orc wrist bands, where do these come from? Doh...orcs out in
Everfrost?
Fergot about them..been along time since I been to my homeland. And,
how
rare of a drop are the wrist bands?

-----Original Message-----
From: Beth [mailto:jaguar@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 3:47 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Langseax quest?


From: Beth <jaguar@...>

You go to the pit of doom, there is a warrior lysbeth something,
she's
the only one actually in the pit, and you have to give her 4 orc
wrist
bands. You get weapon.

> Jonathan wrote:
>
> Anyone know where in Halas this quest can be completed and how
hard it
> is? This weapon has pretty damn good stats (6/23 weight 4),
almost
> identical to a silvery war axe and much better than a combine
weapon.
> It's not lore so it can be dual weald as well. Any help would be
> appreciated.
